abstract: We show that tree pattern matching has significant advantages in the specification and implementation of efficient code generators. We present a top-down tree-matching algorithm that is particularly well suited to code generation applications. Finally, we present a new back-end language that incorporates tree pattern matching with dynamic programming into a uniform framework for the specification and implementation of efficient code generators.

authors.name: Alfred V. Aho
authors.affiliation: AT&T Bell Laboratories, Murray Hill, New Jersey

title: Efficient tree pattern matching (extended abstract): an aid to code generation
